Title: BootstrapPanelBaseBehavior
Description: AjaxControlToolkit based behavior base for javascript behaviors with Twitter Bootstrap properties and methods.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
AjaxControlToolkit based behavior base for javascript behaviors with Twitter Bootstrap properties and methods.

BootstrapPanelBaseBehavior

BootstrapPanelBaseBehavior is an AjaxControlToolkit based client side - javascript - behavior. This behavior is a base class for other behaviors, which use the Bootstrap panels.

Usage

Behavior reference from other behavior:
   function execute() {
     Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel = function (element){
            Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel.initializeBase(this, [element]);

            ...       
     };
     
     Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel.registerClass('Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel', Sys.Extended.UI.BootstrapPanelBase);
     ...
    } // execute

Usable inherited methods and properties in the derived class

Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel.prototype = {
            initialize: function (){
                Sys.Extended.UI.AdPanel.callBaseMethod(this, 'initialize');

                var buttonClickHandler = Function.createDelegate(this, this._onButtonClick);

                // properties from the base class
                var x = this._BadgeCSS.split(' ');
                var y = this._Title || "Partners";

                // methods from the base class
                var div = this._createButtonGroup(this.get_element());
                var button = this._createButton(buttonClickHandler, div, true);

            },

            ...

            _onButtonClick: function (srcE){
             
            }
};
